name: The Room (itch) (Junru Xu)
description:
The Room is an escape-the-room style game! 

Can you figure out the logic and get out?! Interact with the objects around you and pay attention to their hints! Find a way to get out of the room. Be aware: there is a time limit!

------

Controls: 

W/A/S/D to move

Left Click to interact 

------

Information:

This is a group project for Unity class Spring '22. The assignment is to create a first person adventure game. 

Group members:

Junru Xu: Grab/drop script, Menu scene, Win/Lost scene, Sound, Presentation

Beatriz Ribeiro: Concept and Game Design, Player movement, Safe keypad, Timer

YouJin Song: Modeling, UI & UX, Lighting, Animation, Fade in/out, Final debug

Link for game presentation slides.

------

External credits:
